A great hotel in an even better location
reviews.text: We were traveling to Rio in connection with a cruise and decided to arrive a few days early to see the town. Based on other travelers' reviews we decided to stay in Ipanema and, based on comments from others staying in Copacabana, we made the right decision. The hotel is centrally located opposite the beach. There are many great restaurants within easy walking distance including La Garota de Ipanema where the "The Girl from Ipanema" was written. The neighborhood is safe and fun to explore.

reviews.title: Best Value Hotel in Rio de Janeiro - Location Location Location
reviews.text: The accomodation is decent but it is not comparable to other 4 star hotels worldwide. Nonetheless we had a good experience, the rooms were clean, breakfast was good and the staff were helpful. The location is perfect, great views of Ipanema beach, and very close to banks and restaurants. We felt very safe in this area. There was a great vibe in Ipanema! PS We recommend staying in Ipanema rather than Copacabana.

reviews.title: Excellent prices, Clean Room, Enjoyable Stay
reviews.text: I stayed at the Best Western Sol Ipanema for 3 days in December because I had to move out of the Sofitel. While the hotel is small and my room was on the mountain side, the room was newly renovated, very clean and perfect for me. Bed was comfortable, internet worked well, and the breakfast (included) was excellent, and American style. The staff were friendly and helpful. I will be staying again on my next trip.

reviews.title: Better than expected!!
reviews.text: My only complaint was dinner at the restaurant was not very enjoyable as the lighting was like being in an operating room --- too much ---- making the whole place sterile. There was no one else in the entire dining room eating, and this is probably why. The room has obviously been redecorated recently and is so nice, if only the lighting were fixed. The had no ability to dim the lights nor did they have candles on the tables. In short, I realized what it is like to eat in a restaurant with zero ambience. The lasagna I had was very good anyway. There are plenty of other places to eat in Ipanema.
